plot: Skyler Stone is an actor/comedian with an amazing ability to "con" people. Comedy Central has decided to put cameras on this wiz kid to see what sort of elaborate pranks he can pull off.
plot_en: Skyler Stone is an actor/comedian with an amazing ability to "con" people. Comedy Central has decided to put cameras on this wiz kid to see what sort of elaborate pranks he can pull off.
plot_es: Skyler Stone is an actor/comedian with an amazing ability to "con" people. Comedy Central has decided to put cameras on this wiz kid to see what sort of elaborate pranks he can pull off.
title: Con
